Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 71st/Central Park
ShortDescription: #67 buses are temporarily rerouted via 76th, Pulaski, Marquette, Kedzie, and 71st, due to defective railroad gates near 71st/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 76th, Pulaski, Marquette, Kedzie, and 71st, due to defective railroad gates near 71st/Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.
